title: Candlelight: Vivaldi’s Four Seasons Concert - Dates & Tickets
text: We are honored to collaborate with Fever to bring you the Vivaldi Candlelight live series. Vivaldi’s Four Seasons comes alive in an unforgettable Vivaldi Candlelight Concerts experience. This special performance blends the brilliance of baroque with the intimacy of candlelit venues, offering a fresh take on one of classical music’s most celebrated works. The tour will take place across the U.S., Canada, the UK, Germany, and Australia, with performances in New York, Vancouver, Seattle, Dallas, London, and Melbourne. Don't miss the chance to experience Vivaldi in a breathtaking new way—secure your tickets today!
